---

This potent weapon used by [Treerazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3218) is a _+4 [greater corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2834) [major striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2829) obsidian [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)_ that grants a +4 item bonus to attack rolls, deals an extra 2d6 damage to [plants](/Traits.aspx?ID=668), and has the properties of [adamantine](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2855). It deals an additional die of damage when wielded by Treerazer.

**Activate—Owner’s Authority** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=689))   **Requirements** You aren’t wielding _Blackaxe_ and you are its true owner; **Effect** You sense the world around _Blackaxe_ as though you were in its location and can use any of your innate spells through the link as if it were the source of the spell. If another creature is wielding _Blackaxe_, it must succeed at a DC 50 Will save or be [slowed 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) until it relinquishes the weapon.

**Activate—Owner’s Reclamation** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=710))   **Requirements** You aren’t wielding _Blackaxe_ and you are its true owner; **Effect** _Blackaxe_ appears in your hands, teleporting instantly from its prior location.

**Activate—Rejuvenating Deforestation** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571), [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=623), [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=509)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** Make a [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) against a living tree with _Blackaxe_. If it hits, the tree withers to ash and you heal 250 Hit Points and gain the benefit of a 6th-rank [_sound body_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1679) spell.

**Destruction** Chop a powerful magical tree with _Blackaxe_, and while the sap is still fresh, sever one of [Cyth-V’sug’s](/Deities.aspx?ID=74) limbs. This makes _Blackaxe_ explode violently.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
